relics.name: Gunsmith's Bible
relics.description: Right click to permanently replace this with a Cannon Trinket Relic, based on your current Act.
relics.flavorText: Waiting until later Acts grants progressively stronger Cannon Trinket Relics.

relics.name: Money Bag
relics.description: When you spend gold at shops, add it here. When you lose gold, lose it from here first instead.

relics.name: Writing Reed
relics.description: Whenever you apply thepirate:Ink, apply 1 additional thepirate:Ink.

relics.name: Exotic Dish
relics.description: At the start of battle, apply 5 thepirate:Ink to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Inspirational Ornament
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 20 cards from the base characters to add to your deck.

relics.name: Navigation Device
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, thepirate:Dig.

relics.name: Wooden Compass
relics.description: Whenever you thepirate:Bury a card, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

relics.name: Greedy Chest
relics.description: At the start of battle, gain 1 Strength for every 100 gold you have.

relics.name: Wooden Leg
relics.description:
At the start of battle, thepirate:Bury up to 3 cards.

Tip:
At anytime, you may right click this relic to save up to 3 cards to be preselected at the beginning of combat.

relics.name: Black Cannon Trinket
relics.description:
At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand.
Cannon gains:
The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0.

relics.name: Gold Cannon Trinket
relics.description:
At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand.
Cannon gains:
The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0.
Apply Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Gain 2 Strength.

relics.name: Platinum Cannon Trinket
relics.description:
At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand.
Cannon gains:
The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0.
Apply Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies.
Gain 2 Strength.
All enemies lose 2 Strength.

relics.name: Silver Cannon Trinket
relics.description:
At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand.
Cannon gains:
The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0.
Apply Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Experimental Cannon
relics.description:
Replaces your Cannon relic (or Gunsmith's Bible ).
At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand.
Cannon gains:
The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0 and is played twice.

relics.name: Motivation
relics.description: The first time you thepirate:Bury each turn, gain [E] .

relics.name: Bottled Void
relics.description: Choose a card. You cannot draw the chosen card in your opening hand at the start of combat.

keywords.name: Bleeding
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to half your Bleeding (round up), and then reduce your Bleeding by that amount.

keywords.name: Bury
keywords.description: Select a card from your draw pile and discard it.

keywords.name: Corrupt Artifact
keywords.description: Prevents the next buff that would be applied to target.

keywords.name: Dig
keywords.description: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and upgrade it.

keywords.name: Ink
keywords.description: The next time this enemy would deal damage, prevent damage equal to the ink value, deal that much damage to the enemy, and then remove that much ink.

keywords.name: Lure
keywords.description:
While this is in your deck, it's associated Predator card will always spawn in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 rare.
When the corresponding Predator card is added to your deck, remove this from your deck.
Can only spawn from combat card rewards.

keywords.name: Mysterious
keywords.description: This card cannot be upgraded outside of combat.

keywords.name: Predatory
keywords.description:
If your deck contains the associated Lure card, always spawns in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 rare. Cannot spawn through any other method.
When added to your deck, the corresponding Lure is removed.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Permanently remove this card from your deck.

keywords.name: Storm
keywords.description: Play a copy of this card for each previous card played this turn (you can't take damage while playing copies).

keywords.name: Volatile Ink
keywords.description: Ink is removed from enemies at the end of turn instead of during damage (benefits multi-attacks).

mods.name: The Abyssal
mods.credits: Basemod, ModTheSpire, StSLib, Playtesting: Vex'd, Laertes, Arch. Art: Jessparro
mods.description: Adds The Abyssal as a new playable character.
